I am a big Half Life Universe fan, so it is hard to choose a favorite, but this is likely my favorite Half Life game.  The pacing is great, the gameplay is varied, and I wanted to keep playing after I finished.  I put off playing the episodes for a long time, but this one in particular is well worth your time.

Esta continuación de Half Life 2 es superior al episodio 1 e incluso al propio Half Life 2. Una historia más elaborada, mejor contada y con mucha más carga emocional. Un ritmo de juego que va en aumento y una jugabilidad que saca todo lo bueno de Half Life y lo potencia. Es más largo que el episodio 1, todas sus fases están a un gran nivel, sin altibajos importantes y con mucha variación de escenarios, además de presentar secretos por primera vez. Podremos conocer en mucha más profundidad el universo de Half Life, en especial a la especie Vortigaunt y las hormigas León.

En este episodio 2 disfrutamos de grandes momentos de exploración de entornos muy abiertos, de nuevas propuestas jugables como la detección de lugares llenos de suministros a través de un radar y la observación del entorno. Este episodio está más enfocado a la exploración y resolución de puzzles, lo cual se agradece bastante. Además todos los escenarios que visitamos son nuevos y no se reutilizan tantos enemigos y escenarios como sí ocurría en el episodio 1. Esta vez los combates están mejor resueltos. Son más estratégicos con la inclusión de nuevos enemigos muy originales a la vez que letales. No tendremos que lidiar con tiroteos monótonos como ocurría al final de Half Life 2, sino que ahora los combates están mejor medidos, en escenarios que admiten más posibilidades e incluso con una nueva arma.
Además, tenemos la posibilidad del uso de un nuevo vehículo, que en la fase final nos ayudará para detener a los robots zancudos y cazadores en la gran zona de White Forest. 

En resumen, un episodio muy recomendable donde han madurado la jugabilidad, sacando partido de todos los puntos fuertes de este juego y, sobre todo, dando más importancia a la historia y los personajes, que esta vez poseen una caracterización más profunda. Un final de la saga totalmente abierto (esperando su continuación desde hace ya 9 años) con esta intensa expansión de Half Life 2.  8'4

By far, one of the most interesting and best games I've ever played! A friend of mine recommended me to play the Half-life series and it just blew me away. I love the gameplay. The characters stick what they do and I love the soundtracks. It fits well while fighting the combines and escaping them. Definitely recommend all the Half-life games to everyone. Half-life, Half-life 2, Half-life 2 ep. 1 & 2. I already miss playing the Half-life games and I think I'mma play them again soon just for the enjoyment. I give this game a 10/10 :D

Half Life 1 & 2 are easily classic and amazing games and so are Episodes 1 & 2, but I would like to say that episode Two was probably my favorite of the series.

I am very happy that valve chose to step away from the urban theme the half life games have and give it a very rural scenario.

It certainly worked well and the strider battle was the most intense and fun moment of the series.

Episode 2 is arguably the best HL game despite its short length. It is a bit more open than previous games in the series, meaning that you have more freedom to move around even though the game is still linear. This game, in my opinion is where Valve was at their best in terms of quality game design, and it really shows. Not to spoil anything, but the game also doubles as the world's best waiting simulator after the ending. You don't even have to have the game running to experience the waiting simulator part!

10/10 would wait for HL3 again

GOOD:

Textures

BAD:

Once Again The Music is Boring (The Main Reason why I replaced Nearly Every Track with Adrenaline Horror)
Valve Left Gordon Freeman's Story in the Dust After this Game.

Punto y "final" de la legendaria saga de Half-Life. Muy bueno, al igual que cada uno de ellos (aunque el primero siempre será el mejor). Continuamos justo donde lo dejamos en Episode One, tras escapar de la explosión de Ciudad 17; ahora tendremos que abrirnos paso por sus alrededores hasta llegar a White Forest, donde nos reuniremos con Eli Vance y compañía para lanzar un cohete que cierre el gran portal que se ha abierto sobre Ciudad 17.

Este juego es el pionero de que aún se espere el mítico Half-Life 3. La saga perfectamente podría acabarse en el Episode Two, salvo un trágico final que queda de cliffhanger hacia la continuación de la serie: tendremos que viajar hacia el Ártico para destruir una nave denominada "Borealis", que tranposrtaba cargamento científico de Aperture (empresa de la saga Portal). El objetivo no está tan claro, pero si alguna vez sale el Half-Life 3 (esperemos que sí porque el final es del todo inconcluso) el argumento se narrará en el Ártico .

[h1]8/10[/h1] Half-Life 3 100% Confirmed tras acabar el juego.

Half Life 2  Episode 2

Episode Two knüpft direkt an das Ende von Episode One an. Die Zitadelle von City 17 ist explodiert, wodurch der Zug, der Alyx und Gordon aus der Stadt bringen sollte, entgleist. Die beiden müssen sich nun den Weg durch das Umland von City 17 bahnen, um eine aus der Zitadelle gestohlene Nachricht mit wichtigen Informationen zum Widerstand zu bringen.

Dr Freeman … I realize this moment may not be the most … convenient for a heart to heart but I had to wait until your friends were otherwise occupied. There was a time they cared nothing for Miss Vance, when their only experience of humanity was a crowbar coming at them down a steel corridor. When I … plucked her from Black Mesa hehe, I acted in the face of objections that she was a mere child and of no practical use to anyone, I have learned to ignore such naysayers when quelling them hm ? was out of the question. Still, I am not one to squander my investments, and I remain confident she was worth far more than the initial, appraisal. That's why I must now... extract from you some small repayment owed for your own survival. See her safely to White Forest, Dr. Freeman. I wish I could do more than keep an eye on you, but I have agreed to abide by certain … restrictions. Well now, listen carefully, my dear. When you see your … father, relay these words: "prepare for unforeseen consequences".

Half-Life 2: Episode 2 is in my opinion the best Half-Life game of all time. It has a great story, several new and challenging enemies, several new and interesting characters, and a great sequel in Episode 1. The A.I. is slightly improved, the H.E.V. suit has had a slight modification, as well as the Gravity Gun. Graphics has also been improved, but nothing noticable. The game also seems much more tense than other Half-Life games because of the story. A new weapon for killing Striders is also introduced, and the ending will make you understand why everyone wants Half-Life 3. I would reccomend this game to anyone wanting to finish the Half-Life story. 10/10

The fact we're still eagerly awaiting a sequel after a nearly 10 year long cliffhanger speaks for itself.

It's almost poetic, really. Half-Life 2: Episode 2 details the struggle of Gordon Freeman and Alyx Vance as they struggle through hardships on their way to White Forest. The game, after a few surprises here and there, ends on a high note - the Combine have, for now, been defeated. Everyone is celebrating, but also awaiting anxiously for what comes next.

But there is hope.

Then, as the game ends, that hope has been shattered, sucked dry in a few, agonizing moments. With Eli gone, the Resistance has lost some of its will to fight. Even though the Combine have been crippled, they do not die, and the Resistance must struggle yet more against the shadow of their malefactors.

Time will tell whether or not they succeeded. Perhaps the Resistance, after waiting for over a decade, will finally get their wish - to be free, at last. They can finally rest a little bit easier at night, knowing that they now have what they wanted.
Until such a day, however, this is the end of the line. This is the final stop until they finish building that railroad ahead.

In the meantime... This is where I get off.
The game was awesome! But this cliffhanger is AWFUL. DO NOT BUY, DON'T PLAY HALF LIFE, DON'T GET STUCK WAITING 23498572398572384728397 YEARS FOR HL3!!!!

Первый эпизод, как и вторая часть, произвёл на меня очень сильное впечатление. После него мне захотелось ещё продолжения, так как продолжительность у первого эпизода была не такая большая, как у второй части. Приобрёл её вместе с первым эпизодом, но не сразу прошёл её, так как она у меня вылетала по неизвестной причине. Помогла переустановка спустя долгое время. Теперь можно и высказаться о ней. 
Графика. Движок остался тот же: Source. Но нововведения в графике есть, и их много. Также они были применены в Portal и Team Fortress 2, вышедшие в тот же год, что и она. Локации отлично изображены: дизайнеры в Valve всегда работают на ура. Персонажи классно изображены. Как и в предыдущих частях, я испытываю симпатию к Аликс Вэнс (просто милашка ^^).
Озвучка. По прежнему русская озвучка радует. Актёры всё те же. По прежнему музыка в Half-Life радует. Ещё отмечу, как и в предыдущих частях, отличный звук у оружия. Из-за этого чувствуется оружие. 
Сюжет. Это прямое продолжение первого эпизода. Сюжет интересный, интригующий и проработанный. Персонажи классно раскрываются. Появился один лишь новый персонаж. Концовка осталась открытой и намекающей на продолжение. Правда, этого продолжения нет уже 10 лет. 
Геймплей. В геймплее, как и в графике, появились изменения, которые можно заметить в процессе прохождения. Стрелять также приятно из любого оружия, а также применять монтировку или же грави-пушку. Достаточно много экшена, как и в предыдущих частях. 
Отличная игра в жанре FPS, как и все предыдущие части, с интересным сюжетом и отличным геймплеем, приятной графикой и отличной озвучкой. Насчёт Half-Life 2: Episode Three или Half-Life 3, я очень сильно сомневаюсь, что вообще появится в свет, потому что после Counter-Strike: Global Offensive (2012 год, если кто забыл) от них ни одной игры не вышло. А эту игру взять стоит, кому понравились Half-Life 2 и первый эпизод:)

[h1][i]Non può finire così...[/i][/h1]

Continua la storia di Half-Life 2: Episode 1. (Allerta spoiler) [spoiler]Dopo essere sopravvissuti e fuggiti dall'esplosione di City 17, Gordon e Alyx hanno l'opportunità di chiudere definitivamente il portale tra la Terra ed il mondo dei Combine. L'unica cosa da fare è portare il pacchetto dati, che Alyx ha trafugato dai computer Combine di City 17, al sicuro alla base della Resistenza. Da lì, potranno usare i dati per impostare un missile in modo che chiuda il portale, una volta lanciato contro di esso (con gnomo da giardino annesso, se vi va). Il percorso verso casa è però periglioso, ed anche quando tutto sarà finito ed il portale sarà chiuso, ci saranno dei conti in sospeso da sistemare...[/spoiler]

La [b][u]durata[/u][/b] di questo episodio è circa il 40-45% di Half Life 2. Giù di lì. Almeno così m'è sembrato.

Per quanto riguarda la [b][u]parte tecnica[/u][/b], rimando alla mia [url=http://steamcommunity.com/id/guykarat/recommended/220]recensione di Half Life 2[/url].

Ed ora, [b][u]il finale[/u][/b]. Non dirò come finisce questo gioco, ma dirò che, se non vi sentite pronti a provare il più grosso [i]cliffhanger[/i] della vostra vita, è meglio che non lo giochiate. La Valve non poteva trovare modo migliore (e, sotto alcuni aspetti, peggiore) per tenerci col fiato sospeso per anni dopo la fine del suo gioco. È palese come la luce del sole che ci sarà un seguito, [b][u]deve[/u][/b] esserci... il problema è che non si sa quando ci sarà. Sono passati quasi 9 anni dal rilascio di questo gioco, ed ancora non si sa basilarmente nulla di Half-Life 3.
Ora capisco come ci si sente, cara community. I know the feel. Forse dovremo attendere l'arrivo del Source Engine 2 (pienamente confermato) per vedere questo nuovo titolo. Prego soltanto che la Valve lo faccia all'altezza dei precedenti.

Forza ragazzi, tutti in coro!
[h1][b]Gaben, we want Half-Life 3! And for God sake, make sure that, after 9 years in development, it'll be worth the wait!!! XD

Zatímco první epizodu jsem zkritizoval, jakožto nikam nevedoucí pokračování, dnes již zastaralé legendy. U druhé epizody budu zase trošku milejší. Ta totiž na to jde lehce jinak a už od prvního momentu víte, že bude někam směřovat. A tak máte cíl, příběhové pozadí a jdete na velké dobrodružství, to opravdu ale někam vede, stále se něco děje, herní design je i po letech velmi dobrý a nový enemáci umí i způsobit značné potíže. Problémy na každém rohu si vlastně i užíváte, opět si v něčem zajezdíte a nakonec vás to i příběhově odmění – dozvíte se tak nové informace z tohoto zvláštního světa, o onom záhadném muži, minulosti Alyx i o něčem, co je nám dnes známé jako herní spin-off Portal. Bohužel to po docela zábavné pasáži skončí a pak teprve pochopíte, proč chce každý vědět, co bude sakra dál. 60%
good

What will be next?! Waitin' for next game.

혼자 문도 못열지만 없는 길을 창조해서 무단침입하는 기술과 특수부대와 좀비, 심지어는 자기 몸집의 3~4배는 될법한 개미귀신들을 쏴죽여버리는 폭력이 곧 세상을 굴복시킨다는 자신의 철학을 혼돈의 카오스상태의 지구에 뿌리깊이 새기고있는 한 천재공학자의 2번째 이야기 2번째 에피소드입니다.
에피소드 1,2 의 총합 플레이타임은 약 7시간, 최소한의 창의력도 탑재되지 않은 저이지만 이토록 짧은 게임에 각각 3,4시간을 투자했다는 말은 눈치까셨겠지만 하프라이프가 늘 그렇듯 불친절한 안내입니다.
잠깐 멍때리고 있으면 내가 뭘 해야하는지도 모르죠. 재미없는건 아니지만 에피소드 2에서 기억나는건 개미귀신이랑 싸운거밖에 없습니다. 그거말곤 뭐 기억나는게 없어서 평가를 뭐라 적어야할진 모르겠는데

주말에 어차피 여친은 없으실거고 놀 친구도 없는데 드럽게 심심할때 심심풀이로 하기 딱 좋은 게임이지만 두번 플레이하고 싶은 마음은 없네요.
뭐 메이플스토리하다가 지루하면 한 번 더 할 생각입니다.
서버는 이노시.. 아닙니다.

Гейб, когда ТРЕТЬЯ ЧАСТЬ? (3 / THIRD EPISODE)

There we're supposed to be three episodes.
But we only received two of them in the end.
And therefore: There wasn't a proper ending.
However: They are both simply really good.
These games deserve the positive reviews.
Especially thanks to the great storytelling.
And the gameplay is of course awesome.
I loved the very first half-life game as well.
This entire franchise is simply fascinating.
And these two episodes are simply great.
The storytelling went on a whole new level.
And the atmosphere and visuals are great.
You can even get the soundtracks for free.
That just really deserves a positive review.

I'm probably the only person out there that doesn't want Half-Life 3 yet. I'm still waiting on the release of Half-Life 2: Episode Three.

We are at the mid-point in our trilogy of episodes which will conclude in [b] Episode 3 [/b]. - Gabe Newell 2007
